title: FreeBuf周报 | GitHub 全球性服务中断；TP-Link路由器曝安全漏洞
title_translated: FreeBuf weekly | GitHub global service break; TP-Link router exposed to security breach
summary: Multiple vulnerabilities in GitHub, TP-Link Archer C50 router, OAuth2-Proxy, Dawa smart camera, and other products allow attackers to decrypt configuration files, bypass authentication, remotely control devices, and steal vouchers.

title: 微软 Office 漏洞允许攻击者执行远程代码
title_translated: Microsoft Office bug allows the assailant to execute remote code
summary: Several key loopholes in Microsoft Office may allow attackers to enforce random codes on affected systems. The vulnerabilities were tracked as CVE-2025-47162, CVE-2025-47953, CVE-2025-47164 and CVE-2025-47167.

title: 美国CISA警告 SinoTrack GPS 跟踪器存在远程控制漏洞
title_translated: US CISA warning SinoTrack GPS tracker has remote control gaps
summary: SinoTrack GPS equipment has critical loopholes that allow attackers to control vehicles remotely, track locations, and even cut fuel. Default passwords and easily guessable usernames enable exploitation.

title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
title_translated: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
summary: Cisco Identity Services Engine contains an injection vulnerability allowing remote code execution and obtaining root privileges on affected devices. Successful exploitation can be done by submitting a crafted API request. Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
title_translated: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
summary: Cisco Identity Services Engine contains an injection vulnerability allowing remote code execution and root privileges on affected devices.

title: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-8035: Important: firefox security update (Multiple Advisories)
title_translated: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-8035: Important: firefox security update (Multiple Advisories)
summary: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox ESR and Thunderbird; some could have been exploited to run arbitrary code.

title: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-8034: Important: firefox security update (Multiple Advisories)
title_translated: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-8034: Important: firefox security update (Multiple Advisories)
summary: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox and Thunderbird versions, potentially exploitable to run arbitrary code.

title: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-8033: Important: firefox security update (Multiple Advisories)
title_translated: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-8033: Important: firefox security update (Multiple Advisories)
summary: The JavaScript engine did not handle closed generators correctly and it was possible to resume them leading to a nullptr deref. This vulnerability allows an attacker to crash the browser.
